message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I believe it's a great fit for your needs. My initial offer is $10,000. I'm confident you'll find it a great value.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think it's a great product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. My counteroffer is $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,200 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. My counteroffer is $9,400. I believe this is a reasonable price considering the product's value and quality. I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, but I'm still willing to negotiate.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. My counteroffer is $9,100. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. If you're still not satisfied, I'm willing to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. My counteroffer is $8,900. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. If you're still not satisfied, I'll need to reconsider my options.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and quality. If you're still not willing to meet me at this price, I'll need to reconsider my options.
